review_data.title: special. best beef
review_data.content: there are three good spanish restaurants in ZH: Real near Stauffacher, Madrid im Niederdörfli and Costa Brava close to Limmatplatz. All have good wine, excellent seafood and serve amazing beef. all have wine businesses and will sell you bottles at a discount.

review_data.title: Unbelievably delicious!
